story_stone_06_01000/2401_1101_0100_20:
Moments before the mysterious, resonating voice
interrupted Professor Bellis’s presentation...
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1101_0200_20:
The development team was struggling to figure out
how to get sync stones ultimate to work with
Poryphones.
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_0400_10:
Any apps or software we make capable of
controlling the power of sync stones ultimate
always end up so complicated to use...
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_0500_10:
Well, we’re used to working with all kinds of
technology, so something complicated should be no
problem for us to handle.
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_0600_10:
But something like this might be too much for kids
or people who aren’t great with tech to handle...
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_0700_10:
This undertaking of ours is quite challenging...but
truly fascinating!
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_0800_10:
These stones hold potential that is beyond human
comprehension! Researching them is a truly
rewarding experience!
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_1100_10:
Hello, hello. My name’s Jacq. I’m a teacher from
the Paldea region!
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_1200_10:
Fun fact about me—I actually developed a
Pokédex app for Rotom Phones!
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_1300_10:
And a certain someone told me that I might be
able to offer you a helping hand.
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_1500_10:
Oh, I’ve also been involved in developing a
Pokédex! Please help us!
story_stone_06_01000/2401_1201_1600_10:
Then let’s get started right away. Mr. Jacq, do you
have any ideas on how we might address the
accessibility issues we keep encountering?
